appDescription: TalkRizz is an app where young people connect with strangers they find inspiring, and start shaping the future world while making new friends.
ageConfirmation: By entering, you confirm that you are 18 years or older.
talkRizzDescription: TalkRizz is putting people where you expect to connect over time. There are a lot of ways to start, and a lot of reasons a lot of people do it:
PrivacyFirstDesc: We're open-source and committed to your privacy. None of your conversations are saved, allowing you to speak freely with anyone, anytime.
meetNewPeopleDesc: Connect with strangers from around the world and expand your social circle.
learnPerspectivesDesc: Engage in conversations that challenge your thinking and broaden your horizons.
practiceSkillsDesc: Improve your communication skills in a low-pressure environment.
testimonial1: "I love that TalkRizz doesn't overcomplicate things. It's easy to start chatting and meeting new people!"
testimonial2: "TalkRizz has helped me make friends from all over the world. It's amazing how diverse the community is!"
testimonial3: "As an introvert, TalkRizz has been a great way for me to practice socializing without the pressure of face-to-face interactions."
ageVerificationDesc: You must be 18 years or older to use TalkRizz. Are you 18 or older?
